articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: The Kashmir Files box office collection Day 3: Vivek Agnihotri film earns Rs 27.15 cr in 1st weekend, shows phenomenal growth on Sunday - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Kashmir Files box office collection Day 3: The Anupam Kher-starrer's total collection over the opening weekend now stands at Rs 27.15 crore. The film showed over 300% growth on Sunday.
articles.content: On the third day of its theatrical journey, Vivek Agnihotri’s The Kashmir Files continued its domination of the box office after a modest but strong first-day total start. It began with Rs 3.55 crore… [+1391 chars]

articles.title: Ted Lasso: Behind the scenes of the uplifting show that changed Hollywood - 60 Minutes
articles.description: Jason Sudeikis and the cast and crew of “Ted Lasso” tell Norah O’Donnell about the show’s improbable rise and positive message.Ted Lasso streams on Apple TV+...
